I'm curently working on a shading device, adapted in front of a Testroom. The problem is, everytime i connect the optimized Shading Geometry to the createHBSrfs component, it says i should flip the surface manually. but no matter in which direction i flip the panels it shows always the same errormessage. Maybe someone has an idea on how to solve this Problem. Many thanks in advance! Christian [](http://api.ning.com:80/files/N2Dbljz*EDVLkV0UxUu7spjkk4PN7u4RkJDVNCaVkRHyGHT-SuUbv1SBq*KGnhd4soE6p3B6cO3jJ*4-a-Y5mtJmJ8EqoIBJ/Screenshot2016010709.jpg)
